entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:16 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:16 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
